description:
Maps is the official HP webOS mapping and directions app. Search for businesses, points of interest, or enter a location. Get driving and transit directions with local traffic and road conditions. Three different views [Road, Satellite, or Bird’s Eye] give you the right level of detail to help you find your way. Save locations from previous searches to make getting directions quick and easy.

** Within wireless coverage area only. Actual speeds may vary. Email, mobile number, and related information required for setup and activation. Required data services sold separately; unlimited plan recommended and may be required. Not all web content may be available.
